DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis elective use Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump ( IABP ) patient undergo high-risk Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) reduce rate in-hospital major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event compare patient manage without plan insertion IABP .
DOC.brief_title: Balloon Pump Assisted Coronary Intervention Study
DOC.criteria: impaired leave ventricular function ( Ejection Fraction < 30 % ) large area myocardium risk ( BCIS1 Myocardial Jeopardy Score â‰¥ 8/12 ) cardiogenic shock acute STEMI within previous 48 hour complication recent AMI ( include ventricular septal defect , severe mitral regurgitation , intractable ventricular arrhythmia ) contraindication IABP use ( include significant iliac femoral arterial disease mild aortic regurgitation )
